H3.text: what is the dominant religion in the us. Christianity

A4.text: Christianity is the predominant religion in the United States, although estimates vary among sources.

A5.text: According to a 2024 Gallup survey, approximately 69% of the U.S. population—about 235 million out of 340 million people—identify as Christian.
